stimulusHtml: If the plane has friction so that the sphere rolls without slipping, what is the speed vcm of the center of mass at the bottom of the incline?

features.html: A sphere of mass M, radius r, and rotational inertia I is released from rest at the top of an inclined plane of height h as shown above.
